name: Cisco Switches And Routers
summary: Content Pack parses Cisco IOS syslog messages
description:
Content Pack uses GROK and default bind port is 1515.
Cisco syslog config example:
logging origin-id ip
logging source-interface <interface>
logging host <graylog-server> transport udp port 1515

description.@value: Cisco Switches And Routers Syslog Graphs
